short_summary: Roadway replacement and paving works on Hwy 93N Pobokton and Hwy 11 Banff National Park and Jasper National Park.
description: Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to perform a full-depth roadway replacement in select sections and paving works for Hwy 93N Pobokton and Hwy 11 in Banff National Park and Jasper National Park.
duration_in_months: This project is expected to be completed by September 30, 2023.
